blackCards.text: What my dad got really into during his midlife crisis
What I must destroy all evidence of my involvment with before I run for president
Would freak out my mom if she found in my browser history
What members of New York's social elite are paying thousands of dollars just to experience
Will spice up your sex life
What I spent my whole life working toward
Your mom acting it out in Charades will ruin the game forever

whiteCards: Dining with cardboard cutouts of the cast of "Friends."
A soulful rendition of "Ol' Man River."
Pretty Pretty Princess Dress-Up Board Game.
A man in yoga pants with a ponytail and feather earrings.

Graphic violence, adult language, and some sexual content.

Subduing a grizzly bear and making her your wife.
